data.prayer: Father, help your children in Samtse, Bhutan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samtse, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Samtse, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Samtse, Bhutan to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Samtse, Bhutan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 5,389 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Badaik people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Samtse hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 11 believers in the state of Samtse the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Samtse.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
